headline: Trump returning to Georgia to campaign with David Perdue, Herschel Walker
author: Paul Steinhauser
sentences: Perdue currently trails the conservative governor in the latest public opinion surveys  including a Fox News poll conducted March 2-6 and released on Tuesday that indicates Kemp leading Perdue by 11 points among Republicans likely to vote in the May primary  and in the fight for fundraising.

Walker, who won a Heisman Trophy and helped propel the University of Georgia to a national championship four decades ago, was encouraged by Trump for months last year to run in the race to challenge Democratic freshman Sen. Raphael Warnock.

"The scorched-earth GOP primary distracts from crucial issues impacting Georgians, like access to affordable health care  Commerce is home to one of our state's rural hospitals that closed during the pandemic.

"Trump's increasing involvement in this primary is fueled more by his hatred of Kemp than support for Perdue  now, he's coming to Kemp's own backyard to taunt the governor as he continues trying to oust him.

Also scheduled to appear at the March 26 rally with Trump is former professional and college football star running back Herschel Walker, the clear front-runner in this year's GOP Senate primary in Georgia.
It's doubtful that Trump or Perdue know, or care, that rural communities have sky-high uninsured rates, closing hospitals, and some of the worst health outcomes in the country," Flugrath argued.
Trump, who had unsuccessfully urged the governor and other top Republican officials in the state to overturn the results, has repeatedly vowed to return to Georgia to campaign against Kemp.
But Kemp earned Trump's ire starting in late 2020, after he certified now President Biden's narrow victory in Georgia in the presidential election, following two recounts of the vote.

WHAT A NEW FOX NEWS POLL SHOWS IN GEORGIA'S GOP CLASH FOR GOVERNOR
Four years ago, with the support of Trump, Kemp narrowly defeated Democrat Stacey Abrams to win the governorship.
And Fox News confirmed earlier this week that Perdue will join Trump at the former president's Mar-a-Lago resort in Palm Beach, Florida, on March 16 for a fundraiser.
"I'm proud to have President Donald Trump's endorsement and look forward to welcoming him back to Georgia to rally support for our campaign," Perdue told Fox News.
Georgia's Senate race is one of a handful of contests in November's midterms that could decide whether the Republicans win back the majority in the chamber.
Trump for months urged Perdue to primary challenge the governor, and late last year he endorsed Perdue a day after the former senator launched his bid.
The Fox News poll indicated Walker at 66% support among likely Republican primary voters, with his rivals for the nomination all in the single digits.
FIRST ON FOX: Former President Donald Trump is returning to the crucial battleground state of Georgia in two weeks, to hold a campaign-style rally.
Donald Trump Jr, the former president's eldest child, teamed up with Perdue on the campaign trail on Monday with stops in Cumming and Tifton.
Joining Trump at the rally will be former Sen. David Perdue, who is backed by the former president as he primary challenges Republican Gov.
Fox News has learned that the event will be held on Saturday, March 26, in Commerce, Georgia, northeast of Atlanta.
The trip by Trump will be his first to Georgia since Sept. 25, when he held a large rally in Perry, Georgia.
Ahead of his visit to Georgia, Trump holds a separate rally this Saturday in Florence, South Carolina.
And Walker was endorsed by the former president soon after jumping into the race in the late summer.
HE'S GOT TRUMP'S ENDORSEMENT, SO WHY IS DAVID PERDUE STRUGGLING AGAINST GOV.
Democratic Party of Georgia Max Flugrath charged in a statement.
BRIAN KEMP?
Brian Kemp.
